package.name: Console_Color
package.summary: This Class allows you to easily use ANSI console colors in your application.
package.description: You can use Console_Color::convert to transform colorcodes like %r into ANSI control codes. print Console_Color::convert("%rHello World!%n"); would print "Hello World" in red, for example.

release.notes: Fix #563: Incorrect use of global variable
